results.summary_short: Zany, neo-surreal farce of Southern California predators. Odd and on-target.

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Last Night at the Alamo

results.summary_short: Ribald, slightly mournful chronicle of seedy Houston hangout. Very entertaining.

results.headline: BRADY'S ESCAPE (MOVIE)

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of The Long Ride

results.summary_short: Downed American pilot aided by heroic Hungarian horsemen. Decent U.S.- Hungarian-coproduced adventure lacks identity. More political good will than dramatic impact.
